name: Boots of Elvenkind
url: pfsrd://Core Rulebook/Rules/Magic Items/Wondrous Items/Boots of Elvenkind

Construction.Requirements: Craft Wondrous Item, creator must be an elf

sections.body: These soft boots enable the wearer to move nimbly about in virtually any surroundings, granting a +5 competence bonus on Acrobatics checks.
sections.name: Description
